channel.title: [317] Epirus - Open-source Hyperion with tons of Content
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/8nvaI.png[/img][/center]
Epirus is a 317 server that is aimed to make a Hyperion server with tons of content. Usually, our Hyperions released really lack the content. PI has probably the most content in a 317. Thus, this Hyperion's aim is to have content of a famous PI base (Deathly? Trisidia?) but write the code to the best of our abilities and make this server as efficient as possible. This is a learning experience for me. Make a server with a lot of content to the best of our abilities.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=6]Basic server info:[/SIZE][/B]
Base: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/536842-fury-v4-release-hyperion.html]Fury V4[/url] Hosted project: No, as of now Basic goal: Make a server with a lot of content (to rival PI) to the best of our abilities. Bitbucket: [url=https://bitbucket.org/epirus/epirus]Epirus - Bitbucket[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img]
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://puu.sh/8oc1U.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8obZe.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8oemZ.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8okxt.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8oANY.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8pb2E.png[/img] [/spoiler]
I don't see the need to add any more info, so I shall end this thread.
Thank you, Arham

item.title: [317] Epirus - Open-source Hyperion with tons of Content
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center][/center]

[B][SIZE=5]Server Updates[/SIZE][/B]

  • Using 319 cache as we wait to get a permanent cache/client.
  • Added gambling

[B][U]Gambling[/U][/B]

I’m pretty sure most of you know what this is.

You bet X amount of money, you could win *2 of it (50/50 chance) or lose it.

Read full topic

[B][SIZE=5]Server Updates[/SIZE][/B]

  • Added money pouches.
  • Added item option 3.

View the full commit here.

[U][B]Money pouches[/B][/U]
I’m pretty sure most of you know what a money pouch is. Short version: It stores money.





Yeah, you can’t input higher also:
